title: Marathon Series: Gang Busters 1942 | Hard-boiled Crime Drama - Chapter 1 to 13

sources.title: Marathon Series: Gang Busters 1942 | Hard-boiled Crime Drama - Chapter 1 to 13
sources.description:
Detective Lieutenant Bill Bannister (Kent Taylor) is tasked with stopping a crime wave orchestrated by the elusive Professor Mortis (Ralph Morgan), who leads a gang of supposedly dead criminals revived to do his bidding. With the help of his partner Tim Nolan (Robert Armstrong) and police chief Martin O'Brien (Joseph Crehan), Bannister hunts down Mortis while navigating the cityâ€™s terrorized streets. Meanwhile, reporter Vicki Logan (Irene Hervey) and her photographer Happy Haskins (Richard Davies) follow the case closely, as Bannister seeks justice for his murdered brother and to bring Mortis to justice.



Colorized version https://youtu.be/nnmoogSDOH0


Directors: Noel M. Smith, Ray Taylor
Writers: Morgan Cox, Al Martin, Victor McLeod
Stars: Kent Taylor, Irene Hervey, Ralph Morgan, Robert Armstrong
Genres: Action, Crime, Drama 


Movie & TV serial Marathons:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdb-0j6z1hhKt-KJiqyvJ8Ux
